name: Project Link (Tohu71)
description:
Project Link is a 3D Anime styled Hack and Slash game. Use 3 cool skills and an Arte Burst to defeat as many robots as possible in an arena. If your HP or time runs out it's game over! There's also the tutorial area featuring skill missions and voice acting of one of our teachers!

Controls
Plot

You're a student at a fighting academy. In a digital simulation you're allowed to show off your skills against angry penguin robots.

Team ShoTo

2 Utrecht of the Arts students:

Tommy Huynh -  Game Designer
Showie Gau - Game Artist

----

Further plans for the game include; original music, a second character and a character switch mechanic.
